item.title: Amazon-Owned Twitch Re-adds Bitcoin Payments Using Coinbase
item.description:
Amazon-Owned Twitch Re-adds Bitcoin Payments Using Coinbase

Twitch, an Amazon-owned live streaming video platform which integrated Bitcoin back in August 2014, has began to offer Bitcoin as a payment option again using the Coinbase payment processing gateway since August 21, 2016. Two years ago, Twitch partnered with gaming payments giant Xsolla to provide various payment options to its gamers and users.

item.title: Can Two Ethereum Markets Co-Exist? - CoinDesk
item.description:
Can Two Ethereum Markets Co-Exist? - CoinDesk

How big is the ethereum market? In light of recent developments, answering this question has become more complex for traders and market observers.

item.title: Expert Says BlockStream Mission Not Aligned with Community
item.description:
Expert Says BlockStream Mission Not Aligned with Community

Taylor Gerring, the Director of Technology at Ethereum and former Vice President of Engineering at Hive Bitcoin Wallet, has recently triggered a controversial discussion in various online Bitcoin communities with his statement on social media. On Twitter, Gerring wrote, "Bitcoin needs to fork BlockStream.

item.title: The Bitcoin Game #38: Rodolfo Novak of Coinkite & Opendime
item.description:
The Bitcoin Game #38: Rodolfo Novak of Coinkite & Opendime

Hello, welcome to episode 38 of The Bitcoin Game. I'm Rob Mitchell. It's always great interviewing a knowledgeable person who's not afraid to give an opinion, and Rodolfo Novak is that sort of guest.

item.title: Bitcoin Debit Cards Are Better Than The Chase Sappihre Reserve Travel Card
item.description:
Bitcoin Debit Cards Are Better Than The Chase Sappihre Reserve Travel Card

This boatload of Chase rewards may set off the initial annual US$450 price, assuming one travels a lot. For business people, this card will be far more appealing compared to other offerings. Credit card issuers have to come up with new ways to not only attract new customers but retain existing users as well.

item.title: Is the generated Public Key from Private Key Unique in Bitcoin?
item.description:
Is the generated Public Key from Private Key Unique in Bitcoin?

I am generating public key from my private key. I did in Java script and C#. but generated public keys are different. My Code in c# (KeyCore.NET): PrivateKey pv = new PrivateKey(Globals.

item.title: Bitcoin.org warns users ahead of suspected cyber attacks
item.description:
Bitcoin.org warns users ahead of suspected cyber attacks

Ahead of the upcoming release of Bitcoin Core, Bitcoin.org has warned users that the latest version of the client will likely be a target of state-sponsored cyber attackers. The Bitcoin Core client is responsible for keeping the virtual currency decentralised and also ensures that only valid transactions are accepted.

item.title: Bitcards.us Website Needs Improvements To Address The Scam Accusation
item.description:
Bitcards.us Website Needs Improvements To Address The Scam Accusation

Many people around the world use Bitcoin as a way to obtain [discounted] gift cards for services or product they can't by with cryptocurrency. Platforms such as Gyft and eGifter have become very popular in recent years. But now and then, a new site will pop up offering a similar service.

item.title: Hacking Group Names, Ranked
item.description:
Hacking Group Names, Ranked

This week, a big hacking story broke. Hackers going under the name "The Shadow Brokers" claimed to have hacked a group linked to the NSA referred to as "Equation Group." The hackers dumped a bunch of the group's hacking tools and started a (so far not very successful) bitcoin auction to release more files.

item.title: Bitcoin and the Law of Conservation of Energy - CoinDesk
item.description:
Bitcoin and the Law of Conservation of Energy - CoinDesk

Alex Millar is a blogger, podcaster and YouTube publisher, with a degree in Engineering Physics from Queen's University in Kingston, Ontario, Canada. In this opinion piece, Millar expounds his theory that money is energy, arguing that bitcoin provides a superior alternative to fiat currencies from a purely scientific perspective.
